dsOverview.title: NCDC WBAN Station Library

summary.p: Prepared by the National Climatic Data Center. For each U.S. controlled (and Canadian) station listed, there is a name, WBAN number, latitude and longitude and elevation.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Altitude > Station Height
